text: NGC 6055 is a barred lenticular galaxy located about 450 million light-years away in the constellation Hercules. The galaxy was discovered by astronomer Lewis Swift on June 8, 1886. It also a member of the Hercules Cluster and is a LINER galaxy. ==See also== * List of NGC objects (6001–7000) ==References== ==External links== 6055 57076 Category:Hercules (constellation) Category:Hercules Cluster Category:Astronomical objects discovered in 1886 Category:Barred lenticular galaxies Category:LINER galaxies 10191
title: NGC 6055
